DOC.brief_title: Aerobic Plus Resistance Training Insulin Sensitivity African American Men
DOC.detailed_description: This study design assess effect exercise training insulin resistance African American male . African American male higher rate diabetes low level fitness compare Caucasian male . A project necessary evidence show exercise training reduce risk develop diabetes , though study conduct African American male . In addition , ARTIIS test effect adhere 2008 Physical Activity Guidelines Americans ( 150 minute moderate intensity aerobic activity 2 day 20 minute muscular strength activity ) , insulin resistance African American men . This study provide important information either strengthen refine current physical activity recommendation . Furthermore , intervention deliver community facility order increase likelihood intervention sustainable .
DOC.criteria: You complete three runin screen visit . You selfidentify male African descent . You 35 70 year age . You BMI ( ratio height weight ) great equal 25.0 kg/m2 less equal 40 kg/m2 . You family history diabetes . You currently physically active 20 minute time 3 day per week last 6 month . You participate regular muscle building exercise . You willing give informed consent , willing randomize either healthy living intervention group aerobic plus resistance training exercise group , willing follow protocol group assign . You drink 14 alcoholic drink per week . You plan move study area within next 6 month , plan study area 4 week course study . You another member household participate study . You serious health condition would interfere intervention goal History cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) disorder care physician treat condition , fail provide write documentation physician indicate physician approves enter study Have high blood pressure ( great 155/99 mmHg ) care physician treat condition fail provide write documentation physician indicate physician approves enter study Have previous diagnosis diabetes ( Type 1 2 ) fast plasma glucose > 125 mg/dl Have elevate bad cholesterol ( great equal 190mg/dl ) triglyceride ( great equal 300 ) care physician treat condition fail provide write documentation physician indicate physician approves enter study Are currently take medication diabetes chronic steroid use Have chronic recurrent respiratory , gastrointestinal , neuromuscular , neurological psychiatric condition Have cancer require treatment past 5 year , expect nonmelanoma skin cancer cancer clearly cure option investigator carry excellent prognosis ( e.g. , Stage 1 cervical cancer ) Have autoimmune collagen vascular disease Have immunodeficiency disease HIV You medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator lifethreatening may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol .
